partintro.para: This part of the book summarises the organisation of the &vwg;.
The &hepix; is an organisation and gathering of large predominately &hep; site administrators with the objective of sharing information and benefiting from each others experiences.

The &vwg; was set up by &hepix; to investigate the implications use-cases and requirements of sites that where at the time expected to come from the relatively new technology of &vm; technology. The group is chaired by Tony Cass and has met regularly and maintains a mailing list hepix-virtualisation@cern.ch where the majority of the content of this document is extracted from.
